title: Google\Cloud\GkeBackup\V1\BackupPlan\BackupConfig
name: BackupConfig
description:
BackupConfig defines the configuration of Backups created via this BackupPlan.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.gkebackup.v1.BackupPlan.BackupConfig

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.selected_namespaces
params.description: If set, include just the resources in the listed namespaces.

params.name: data.selected_applications
params.description: If set, include just the resources referenced by the listed ProtectedApplications.

params.name: data.include_volume_data
params.description: This flag specifies whether volume data should be backed up when PVCs are included in the scope of a Backup. Default: False

params.name: data.include_secrets
params.description: This flag specifies whether Kubernetes Secret resources should be included when they fall into the scope of Backups. Default: False

params.name: data.encryption_key
params.description: This defines a customer managed encryption key that will be used to encrypt the "config" portion (the Kubernetes resources) of Backups created via this plan. Default (empty): Config backup artifacts will not be encrypted.

methods.name: getEncryptionKey
methods.description:
This defines a customer managed encryption key that will be used to encrypt the "config" portion (the Kubernetes resources) of Backups created via this plan.

Default (empty): Config backup artifacts will not be encrypted.
